game.beginning: In a world ravaged by an ancient cataclysm, humanity's last stronghold is under threat from a powerful and malevolent force known as "The Devourer".
game.ending: The player must navigate the treacherous landscape to unite the remaining factions against The Devourer and prevent the extinction of humanity.
game.synopsis: In the post-apocalyptic world of Eridoria, ancient technologies hold the key to survival. Players take on the role of a skilled scavenger who stumbles upon an ancient relic with mysterious powers. As they unravel its secrets, they are drawn into a conflict between rival factions vying for control of the remaining resources.
game.title: Echoes of Eridoria
